Module scenebuilder.core
Package com.oracle.javafx.scenebuilder.core.util

Class CoordinateHelper

java.lang.Object
com.oracle.javafx.scenebuilder.core.util.CoordinateHelper
public class CoordinateHelper
extends Object
This class has been created has a workaround for the issue : JDK-8262116 : Nodes used as clip or shape return invalid result for sceneToLocal/localToScene When calculating position for nodes used as clip or as shape, the lack of parent (getParent() return null) cause a calculation error. This class aims to solve this problem until a valid fix is available
Author:
ptreilhes
